flowRoot.flowPara: Connect Four is a group project created for
CS 151: Object-Oriented Design. The goal of the game is connect four pieces in a row, either vertically, horizontally, or diagonally. Bug reports can be sent to (insert email address)@email.com.
Written by Krish Ghiya, Holly Lind, and Albert Ong.

Suspendisse a scelerisque lacus, placerat bibendum lectus. Etiam lobortis fermentum lacus vitae sodales. Suspendisse vitae leo malesuada, viverra metus et, accumsan lacus. Suspendisse nec mollis nisl. Sed vehicula volutpat auctor. Proin quis tortor ac ex iaculis viverra at non nisi.
Written by Krish Ghiya, Holly Lind, and Albert Ong.
